abstract: As the top twelve female contestants competed on “American Idol” on Wednesday, Fox once again easily dominated the night’s ratings as 28.7 million viewers tuned in at 8 p.m. for a two-hour edition of the show, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: As the top twelve female contestants competed on “American Idol” on Wednesday, Fox once again easily dominated the night’s ratings as 28.7 million viewers tuned in at 8 p.m. for a two-hour edition of the show, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
